Gavin Wray

Email template design for Michael Warwick Nicholls

23 August 2012

Michael Warwick Nicholls, a specialist management consultancy recruitment business, required their email newsletters updating in line with their current brand.

We first worked together in 2007 to set up an email newsletter system using Campaign Monitor. On this job, I updated the HTML email templates to reflect MWN’s new brand and supported two staff to use Campaign Monitor to manage their own email campaigns.
